text: The State of Israel is divided into six districts. In Hebrew, a district is called makhoz - מחוז (plural: mehozot - מחוזות). These districts are: # Central District, southern Sharon Plain, northern Shfela # Haifa District, around the city of Haifa and the northern Sharon plain # Jerusalem District, the city of Jerusalem # Northern District, Galilee and the Golan Heights # Southern District, Negev, southern Shfela and Arabah # Tel Aviv District, around the city of Tel Aviv == Unofficial district == * Judea and Samaria Area (a.k.a. the West Bank)
title: Districts of Israel
